pr_title: New design (UI) - Removed old options menu items from FileDisplayActivity

timeline.bodyText:
Please remove this.
This triggers a total sync, which will clash with above syncAndUpdateFolder().
I think we do not need this at all, so just removing it entirely is good.
timeline.author: tobiasKaminsky
JorisBodin

replies.bodyText:
An indention error from me
Now fixed ;)
replies.author: Kilian-Perisset
